h1_content: Flint Vanguard is one of the optional Yaoguai Chief boss fights Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. This is the second of the stone bosses in Chapter 5, and another that will drop a Samadhi Fire Crystal.
h2_content:
When you've completed the challenge of the spiked golden ball that rolls along the Ashen Pass III, you can return to the path. The firewall that was previously there will now have disappeared, and you can enter the Cooling Slope.
As you enter the Cooling Slope for the first time, there are two points of interest to take note of. Up ahead, there's a smattering of rocks. And to the left, there's a Luoija Fragrant Vine. The rocks are the Flint Vanguard boss.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Flint_Vanguard.md', located in the main section titled 'Flint Vanguard'. The section summary is: Flint Vanguard is one of the optional Yaoguai Chief boss fights Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. This is the second of the stone bosses in Chapter 5, and another that will drop a Samadhi Fire Crystal. This excerpt merges content from both the main and sub-sections. The sub-section is titled 'How to Find Flint Vanguard', and the detailed content is as follows:
When you've completed the challenge of the spiked golden ball that rolls along the Ashen Pass III, you can return to the path. The firewall that was previously there will now have disappeared, and you can enter the Cooling Slope.
As you enter the Cooling Slope for the first time, there are two points of interest to take note of. Up ahead, there's a smattering of rocks. And to the left, there's a Luoija Fragrant Vine. The rocks are the Flint Vanguard boss.
